id.description: The unique identifier for the product.

make.description: The brand or manufacturer of the product.

model.description: The specific model of the product.

year.description: The manufacturing year of the product.

price.description: The price of the product in the specified currency.

created_at.description: The date and time when the product was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the product was last updated.
